title: History of Islamic Cairo
itunes:author: Zirrar
itunes:summary:
Episode 1: Join Omar Sheira and me for a walk through of the history of Cairo, from its foundations a thousand years ago to present time. We discuss the Fatimid, Ayyubid (and of course Saladin) and the mighty Mamluks, the giant Ottomans before ending in the French and British rule.

These podcasts will continue as we travel across the world to other Islamic ancient capitals to explore the less known history and art.
itunes:subtitle: Episode 1: Join Omar Sheira and me for a walk thrâ€¦
description:
Episode 1: Join Omar Sheira and me for a walk through of the history of Cairo, from its foundations a thousand years ago to present time. We discuss the Fatimid, Ayyubid (and of course Saladin) and the mighty Mamluks, the giant Ottomans before ending in the French and British rule.

These podcasts will continue as we travel across the world to other Islamic ancient capitals to explore the less known history and art.
